tool_description:
Free API for getting E-books by authors, isbn or title. Full doc here: https://algobook.info/docs/ebook-api

All our free APIs can be found here: https://algobook.info/apis
name: E-book API - Algobook
title: E-book API - Algobook

api_list.name: Get book by ISBN
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://e-book-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ebooks/isbn/9781101147054"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e-book-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://e-book-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ebooks/isbn/9781101147054"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e-book-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
